bibdata.title: Guide for the The Design and Application of Power Electronics in Electrical Power Systems on Ships
Guide for the The Design and Application of Power Electronics in Electrical Power Systems on Ships
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1662/D2.0, Jul 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to power electronics components and systems on ships and similar applications. It summarizes current electrical engineering methods and practices for applying power electronics in electrical power systems on ships and describes analytical methods, preferred parameters and performance characteristics from a common frame of reference for reliable integrated marine electrical power systems.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
